poemContent: Erfolgreich Wenn? I don't know, 'tis but a sound thought To be sucessful when? Ich habe keine Ahnung! The battalion lurches in the creek Shield broken and spirits deep Into the ground, utter despair Through their objective achieved, They sought death. Were they sucessful? Folglich, Sie deprimiert sind. Or were they not? What? What? What? The geenral walked on, Ironed sword at the nape In process of beheading, but losing the head Of himself. The castle lays quiet. Erfolgreich Wenn... Racks all seasons of my health. 
